section.section: Instead of or in addition to reprimanding the licensee or suspending or revoking a license under this subsection, the Board may impose a penalty not exceeding $5,000 for each violation.
The Board shall pay any penalty collected under this subsection into the General Fund of the State.

text.section: On suspension or revocation of a license, the holder shall surrender to the Board the license certificate of the holder.
At the end of a suspension period, the Board shall return to the licensee the license certificate surrendered under this section.
